overview:
Prior to founding AppAssure Software, Dan was a Senior Windows Kernel Engineer for Veritas Software. Previously, he was Chief Kernel Architect for PreciseSRM, the Windows division of Precise Software Solutions, and helped expand its market for the award- winning StorageCentral product line prior to its sale to Veritas Software in June 2003.

Dan was one of the early employees of W. Quinn Associates, and he was Chief Kernel Architect for its top selling lines, QuotaAdvisor and StorageCentral prior to its sale to Precise Software in September of 2001. Dan holds a patent for Windows based kernel driver implementations. Earlier Dan was a Principal Engineer at Digital Equipment Corporation and developed multiple kernel-level drivers for the data protection market.
